attributes.action: Make tuition fees affordable for everyone to obtain higher education.
attributes.additional_details:
We propose that the government reconsider its recently implemented policy to triple the value of the maximum annual university tuition. We believe that the new figure is too high and denies a certain proportion of the British population to a higher education and their future.
We would ask that the Department for Education review the
viability of a return to a reduced rate, allowing every student an equal opportunity to attend a university without being hindered by financial vulnerability.
